TopicTitle: Orbital lines disappear after zooming out at 2560x1600

Articles.Content:
Hey!

I am running KSP 25.0.0 on Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and I ran into this strange issue. The orbital lines in map mode disappear after zooming out. They always disappear at the same spot in the zoom.

At first I thought it was just full screening the game that caused this, because the orbital lines work when it is windowed with just the ubuntu bar thing on the left and top. But the lines also show up normally when full screened at a different resolution (I tried 1600x1200). Also, the issue happens when the game is in windowed mode but still takes up the full 2560x1600, although that was tested in a different window manager (xmonad) so even thought it is probably the same issue I would take that with a grain of salt.
